Title: How to Clarify Roles and Get Results with Jason Williams and Daniel Ramsey
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks with Vice President of EntreLeadership Jason Williams. They discuss how role clarity creates focus and paints a clear picture of what it looks like to win in your role. Later, George sits down with Daniel Ramsey, the executive vice president of EntreLeadership, to dig into how to create role clarity for you and your team members.


You’ll learn:

•      Why you can’t afford to have confused team members

•      How to finally get the results you really want

•      How to tell if you’re winning as a leader

•      If you’re getting sidetracked from your goals
